changeSet.sql: -- Create the contact table CREATE TABLE "contact" ( id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), name varchar(255) NOT NULL, email varchar(255) NOT NULL, mobile_number varchar(20) NULL, is_active bool NOT NULL DEFAULT true, created_on timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), updated_on timestamp with time zone NULL, created_by uuid NULL, updated_by uuid NULL, CONSTRAINT contact_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );
